EmailTemplate.name: 17.BBAccess.Intelligent.none.L.G.E.17002.BBWF 2017 post event.Email Thank You
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for visiting Nokia at Broadband World Forum 2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Enter the era of intelligent access Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Thank you for coming to see us at Broadband World Forum 2017. We really enjoyed the show and we trust you had a rewarding visit too! We were really pleased with the reaction to intelligent access, our vision for a new era of fixed broadband networks that are faster, better and smarter. Hopefully you got a good understanding of how intelligent access can help you achieve your goals. Check out our website for more inspiration and a wealth of materials to help you plan your network’s future. https://networks.nokia.com/intelligent-access <[[https://networks.nokia.com/intelligent-access]]> And, of course, we’d love to continue the conversation. Don’t hesitate to contact your local Nokia sales representative, or simply reply to this email and we’ll get in touch.
Best wishes,
Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
